whatIDo.title: About me
whatIDo.description:
Product designer with 6+ years of experience. Helping startups launch products faster using design, bots, and automation.

My approach: minimum bureaucracy, maximum result.
whatIDo.summary: Also — I share my thoughts in my [TG-channel](https://t.me/+iYATkhA5NoJjYTlk)
